title: [Large-scale] Organizational Learning-Based Leadership Development Program for Corporate Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic managerial task experience and organizational operations comprehension
context.additional_context: A leadership development program for managers in science-related public institutions, analyzing real organizational cases.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to systematically design managerial decision-making based on real case studies within an organization.
Learners can apply three or more team dynamics and conflict management strategies to propose actionable solutions.
Within four weeks after the course, learners establish a performance improvement plan applying the learned content within their organization.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
